public_page.request_doi_description: The request will be evaluated by a curator. Add a message in case of any questions or clarifications. You will receive an email when the request has been evaluated.

publication.info_text: Select the resource you wish to register or publish by uploading a resource or link to a publication.
publication.link_publication_description: E.g. DOI link, link to article, link to video of lecture etc.
publication.no_published_publications_yet: There are no published publications yet
publication.start_with_link_to_publication: Start with a link to a publication

references.delete_doi_text: Removing the link to the publication will change it from a registration to a new publication. Do you want to continue?
references.is_book_a_textbook_confirm: Yes, the book is a textbook
references.is_not_peer_reviewed: The publication is not peer reviewed
references.nvi_success: This publication can be included in NSI
references.nvi_fail_not_rated:
This publication can not be included in NSI, since selected journal is not at level 1 or 2. 

(The journal's level may be changed in the Publication Channel Registry, so the publication can ble included in NSI)
references.nvi_fail_no_peer_review: This publication can not be incuded in NSI, since it's not peer reviewed.
references.series_info: If the book is part of a series

modal_unsaved_changes_description: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave this page?
